attributes.action: Remove Jenny Jones from parliament for sexism and fear mongering.
attributes.additional_details: Blatant sexism after an awful speech made in parliament.
attributes.background: Remove Jenny Jones from parliament after a sexist fear inducing speech, full of extreme views made to turn people against men while harming women by making them think they’re not safe after 6pm

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions that call for people to lose their job, or to resign from a role.
